description: The main.dart file for a Flutter-based front-end application of an online bookstore platform. It includes app initialization, UI components, state management, data models, mock data repository, and navigation for pages like Home, Catalog, Cart, and Profile.

classes.name: Book
classes.description: Data model representing a book with details such as title, author, category, price, rating, image URL, and description.

classes.name: CartItem
classes.description: Model representing an item in the shopping cart, containing a Book and its quantity.

classes.name: MockBookRepository
classes.description: A mock data source providing methods to fetch categories, books, featured books, and individual book details, simulating network delays.

classes.name: CatalogState
classes.description: ChangeNotifier managing the catalog's categories, list of all books, filtered/sorted results, and user-selected filters and sorting options.

classes.name: CartState
classes.description: ChangeNotifier maintaining the cart items, total item count, total price, and methods for adding, removing, and updating cart items.

classes.name: UserState
classes.description: ChangeNotifier representing user profile data with methods to initialize and update user info.

classes.name: RootShell
classes.description: StatefulWidget managing the main bottom navigation and page switching among Home, Catalog, Cart, and Profile pages.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point for the Flutter application, launching the BookStoreApp.
